div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, June 25,1900. THE SWEDISH SUMMER FESTIVAL.

body.p: p.8.... Under the auspices of "The Swedish National Association," a summer festival was held at Fox River Grove yesterday, which was attended by more than 18,000 people. Mr. O.C.Peterson, President of the association said in his speech, that the Swedish population is being rapidly assimilated. He also stated, that Swedish colleges, unable to compete with American educational institutions, will be forced in a few years to close their Higher Swedish Educational Institutions.
